entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 12:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
